name: Gecko Garden
description:
Watch and collect cute geckos in this laid-back, easy-to-play game. Put worms out as a treat and keep an eye out for the variety of unique geckos that come by to snack, sleep, and sunbathe in your garden. Tap newcomers to add them to your catalog and see if you can spot them all!

Collect coins to use in the Shop and give your garden its own personal style with lots of decorations to choose from.

Upcoming updates will bring in new features as well as plenty more geckos to discover! Stay up to date with the latest Gecko Garden news on our Tumblr: @geckogardenapp.
